languages.text: "Так или иначе, но меня изрядно утомили твои попытки отсрочить неизбежное. Уверен, что и ты уже выдох{mf|ся|лась}, гоняясь за нами между звезд. Давай положим этому конец. Закончим противостояние. Мои силы против твоих. Раз и навсегда".

"In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."
languages.original_text: "Так или иначе, но меня изрядно утомили твои попытки отсрочить неизбежное. Уверен, что и ты уже выдох{mf|ся|лась}, гоняясь за нами между звезд. Давай положим этому конец. Закончим противостояние. Мои силы против твоих. Раз и навсегда".

traits.locale_text: "In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

"In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

"In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

languages.text: «Sea como fuere, me he cansado de tus intentos de postergar lo inevitable. Imagino que tú también preferirías dejar de perseguirnos entre las estrellas. Acabemos con esto. Tus fuerzas contra las mías: pongamos fin a este enfrentamiento de una vez por todas».
languages.original_text: "In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

traits.locale_text: «Sea como fuere, me he cansado de tus intentos de postergar lo inevitable. Imagino que tú también preferirías dejar de perseguirnos entre las estrellas. Acabemos con esto. Tus fuerzas contra las mías: pongamos fin a este enfrentamiento de una vez por todas».

languages.text: “总之，你仅仅是在拖延必将到来的事情，我已经感到厌倦了。当然，你在群星之间追逐我们，想必你们也已经筋疲力尽了。是时候结束这场对峙了，我的部队和你的部队正面开战，彻底解决这个问题吧。”
languages.original_text: "In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

traits.locale_text: “总之，你仅仅是在拖延必将到来的事情，我已经感到厌倦了。当然，你在群星之间追逐我们，想必你们也已经筋疲力尽了。是时候结束这场对峙了，我的部队和你的部队正面开战，彻底解决这个问题吧。”

languages.text: 「いずれにせよ、避けられぬ運命を遅らせる度々の試みにほとほと呆れた。お前も惑星間で我々を追うのに疲れ切っていることだろう。もういいじゃないか。この膠着状態を終わらせよう。俺の軍とお前の軍で、決着をつけるのだ」
languages.original_text: "In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

traits.locale_text: 「いずれにせよ、避けられぬ運命を遅らせる度々の試みにほとほと呆れた。お前も惑星間で我々を追うのに疲れ切っていることだろう。もういいではないか。この膠着状態を終わらせよう。俺の軍とお前の軍で、決着をつけるのだ」

languages.text: "Wie auch immer, jedenfalls bin ich Eure Versuche leid, das Unvermeidliche hinauszuzögern. Sicher seid Ihr auch erschöpft von der ständigen Jagd auf uns in den Sternen. Lasst uns das Ganze beenden. Tragen wir diesen Konflikt aus. Meine Kräfte gegen Eure. Ein für alle Mal."
languages.original_text: "In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

traits.locale_text: "Wie auch immer, jedenfalls bin ich Eure Versuche leid, das Unvermeidliche hinauszuzögern. Sicher seid Ihr auch erschöpft von der ständigen Jagd auf uns in den Sternen. Lasst uns das Ganze beenden. Tragen wir diesen Konflikt aus. Meine Kräfte gegen Eure. Ein für alle Mal."

languages.original_text: "In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

languages.text: « Quoi qu'il en soit, je suis las de vous voir vous évertuer à retarder l'inévitable et je suis certain que vous en avez vous-même assez de nous chasser à travers le cosmos. Il est temps d'en finir, de sortir de cette impasse. Affrontons-nous, mes forces contre les vôtres, une bonne fois pour toutes. »
languages.original_text: "In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

traits.locale_text: « Quoi qu'il en soit, je suis las de vous voir vous évertuer à retarder l'inévitable et je suis certain que vous en avez vous-même assez de nous chasser à travers le cosmos. Il est temps d'en finir, de sortir de cette impasse. Affrontons-nous, mes forces contre les vôtres, une bonne fois pour toutes. »

languages.text: "Her hâlükârda kaçınılmazı erteleme çabalarından gına geldi. Şüphesiz sen de bu yıldızlar arası kovalamacadan yorulmuşsundur. Artık bu vaziyete, bu anlaşmazlığı bir son verelim. Benim kuvvetlerime karşı seninkiler. Tek kalemde bitirelim."
languages.original_text: "In any case, I have grown quite tired of your attempts to delay the inevitable. Surely you too have run yourself ragged chasing us between the stars. Let us put an end to this. Finish this standoff. My forces against yours. Once and for all."

traits.locale_text: "Her hâlükârda kaçınılmazı erteleme çabalarından gına geldi. Şüphesiz sen de bu yıldızlar arası kovalamacadan yorulmuşsundur. Artık bu vaziyete, bu anlaşmazlığı bir son verelim. Benim kuvvetlerime karşı seninkiler. Tek kalemde bitirelim."
